tldr: This module enables SAML protocol-based single sign-on (SSO) on a Drupal site and does not sufficiently sanitize user input, resulting in a reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `drupal/miniorange_saml` library to the patch version.
